nodes.text: Starflash was a holovid series created by J'fe Din. The show was actually a means of transmitting codes, passwords and messages to Rebel agents working in the Larrin sector. None of the information was ever apparent to the show's billions of fans because J'fe and her producer always concealed the data in background widescreens or crate labels. The show was the farthest reaching messenger that the Rebels had, and it managed to quicken the downfall of the Empire by a year in the Larrin sector.
